languages.text: "Нахальный, амбициозный и крайне неосмотрительный юнец. Он был низвергнут из драконов кабала, но в первом же бою на арене заслужил симпатии ведьм Губительной жажды и был приглашен в их элиту, Кровавые прозелиты. Говорят, что он причастен к гибели их Суккубы Тазарры — и если это так, то в рядах культа Маражая может ожидать неприятный сюрприз".

traits.locale_text: "Нахальный, амбициозный и крайне неосмотрительный юнец. Он был низвергнут из драконов кабала, но в первом же бою на арене заслужил симпатии ведьм Губительной жажды и был приглашен в их элиту, Кровавые прозелиты. Говорят, что он причастен к гибели их Суккубы Тазарры — и если это так, то в рядах культа Маражая может ожидать неприятный сюрприз".
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "That brazen, ambitious, and woefully imprudent whelp. He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal but earned the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst in his very first fight in the arena. He was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he was involved in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if so, then Marazhai may be disappointed by his reception in the ranks of the Cult."
languages.original_text: "Нахальный, амбициозный и крайне неосмотрительный юнец. Он был низвергнут из драконов кабала, но в первом же бою на арене заслужил симпатии ведьм Губительной жажды и был приглашен в их элиту, Кровавые прозелиты. Говорят, что он причастен к гибели их Суккубы Тазарры — и если это так, то в рядах культа Маражая может ожидать неприятный сюрприз".

traits.locale_text: "That brazen, ambitious, and woefully imprudent whelp. He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal, but his very first arena fight earned him the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst, so he was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he played a part in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if that is true, then Marazhai might be disappointed by the treatment he receives in the ranks of the Cult."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal but earned the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst in his very first fight in the arena. He was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he was involved in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if so, then Marazhai may be disappointed by his reception in the ranks of the Cult."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Un jeune fou aussi effronté qu'imprudent. Il a été exclu des dracons de la Kabale, mais a réussi à obtenir les bonnes grâces des Cérastes de la Soif Fatale lors de son premier combat dans l'arène. Il a été invité à rejoindre leur élite, les Prosélytes sanglants. Certains affirment qu'il n'est pas étranger à la mort de leur succube, Tazarra. Si c'est la vérité, alors il risque d'avoir une mauvaise surprise en intégrant les rangs du Culte. »
languages.original_text: "That brazen, ambitious, and woefully imprudent whelp. He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal but earned the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst in his very first fight in the arena. He was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he was involved in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if so, then Marazhai may be disappointed by his reception in the ranks of the Cult."

traits.locale_text: « Un jeune fou aussi effronté qu'imprudent. Il a été exclu des dracons de la Kabale, mais a réussi à obtenir les bonnes grâces des Cérastes de la Soif Fatale lors de son premier combat dans l'arène. Il a été invité à rejoindre leur élite, les Prosélytes Entachés de sang. Certains affirment qu'il n'est pas étranger à la mort de leur succube, Tazarra. Si c'est la vérité, alors il risque d'avoir une mauvaise surprise en intégrant les rangs du Culte. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “那个厚颜无耻、野心勃勃、愚蠢轻率的家伙，他被逐出了裁决官的行列。不过，他在竞技场的第一场战斗中，就赢得了‘致命饥渴’巫灵教派的青睐，教派邀请他加入最精锐的斗士行列‘血腥叛党’之中。有人说，血腥魔女塔扎菈的死与他有关。如果真的是这样，那玛拉斋可能会对在教派中的地位感到失望。”
languages.original_text: "That brazen, ambitious, and woefully imprudent whelp. He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal but earned the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst in his very first fight in the arena. He was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he was involved in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if so, then Marazhai may be disappointed by his reception in the ranks of the Cult."

traits.locale_text: “那个厚颜无耻、野心勃勃、愚蠢轻率的家伙，他被逐出了裁决官的行列。不过，他在竞技场的第一场战斗中，就赢得了‘致命饥渴’巫灵教派的青睐，教派邀请他加入最精锐的斗士行列‘血腥叛党’之中。有人说，血腥魔女塔扎菈的死与他有关。如果真的是这样，那玛拉斋可能会对在教派中的地位感到失望。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Dieser dreiste, ehrgeizige, beklagenswert unbesonnene Wurm. Er wurde von den Draconen der Kabale verstoßen, hat sich jedoch bei seinem ersten Kampf in der Arena die Gunst der Hekatari des Fatalen Dursts verdient. Er wurde eingeladen, sich ihren Besten anzuschließen, den Blutbefleckten Proselyten. Manche sagen, er sei am Tod ihres Succubus Tazarra beteiligt gewesen. Wenn dem so ist, könnte Marazhai enttäuscht sein, wie er in den Reihen des Kults aufgenommen wird."
languages.original_text: "That brazen, ambitious, and woefully imprudent whelp. He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal but earned the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst in his very first fight in the arena. He was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he was involved in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if so, then Marazhai may be disappointed by his reception in the ranks of the Cult."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser dreiste, ehrgeizige, beklagenswert unbesonnene Wurm. Er wurde von den Draconen der Kabale verstoßen, hat sich jedoch bei seinem ersten Kampf in der Arena die Gunst der Hekatari des Fatalen Dursts verdient. Er wurde eingeladen, sich ihren Besten anzuschließen, den Blutbefleckten Proselyten. Manche sagen, er sei am Tod ihres Succubus Tazarra beteiligt gewesen. Wenn dem so ist, könnte Marazhai enttäuscht sein, wie er in den Reihen des Kults aufgenommen wird."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Mocoso imprudente, desvergonzado y ambicioso... Lo expulsaron de los Dracones de la Kábala, pero se ganó la aprobación de las brujas de la Sed Letal en su primer combate en la arena. Lo invitaron a unirse a su selecto grupo: los Prosélitos Ensangrentados. Algunos dicen que tuvo que ver con la muerte de Tazarra, su súcubo. Si es así, a Marazhai no le gustará haberse unido al Culto».
languages.original_text: "That brazen, ambitious, and woefully imprudent whelp. He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal but earned the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst in his very first fight in the arena. He was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he was involved in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if so, then Marazhai may be disappointed by his reception in the ranks of the Cult."

traits.locale_text: «Mocoso imprudente, desvergonzado y ambicioso... Lo expulsaron de los Dracones de la Kábala, pero se ganó la aprobación de las brujas de la Sed Letal en su primer combate en la arena. Lo invitaron a unirse a su selecto grupo: los Prosélitos Ensangrentados. Algunos dicen que tuvo que ver con la muerte de Tazarra, su súcubo. Si es así, a Marazhai no le gustará haberse unido al Culto».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「図々しく、野心的で、ひどく不謹慎な若造だ。彼は陰謀団のドラコンを追放されたが、アリーナでの最初の戦いで“宿命の渇き”のウィッチの寵愛を得た。彼は彼らの最高幹部である血まみれの改宗者に招かれた。サキュバスのタザーラの死に関与したとも言われている。そうであれば、マラズハイは魔女団の仲間内での自分の受け入れに失望しているかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "That brazen, ambitious, and woefully imprudent whelp. He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal but earned the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst in his very first fight in the arena. He was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he was involved in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if so, then Marazhai may be disappointed by his reception in the ranks of the Cult."

traits.locale_text: 「図々しく、野心的で、ひどく不謹慎な若造だ。彼は陰謀団のドラコンを追放されたが、アリーナでの最初の戦いで“宿命の渇き”のウィッチの寵愛を得た。彼は彼らの最高幹部である血まみれの改宗者に招かれた。サキュバスのタザーラの死に関与したとも言われている。そうであれば、マラズハイは魔女団の仲間内での自分の受け入れに失望しているかもしれない」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Yüzsüz, hırslı ve üzüntü verici derecede ihtiyatsız enik. Kabal Drakonları onu makamından etti, o ise arenadaki ilk dövüşünde Ölüme Susamışlığın Viçleri'nin gözüne girmeyi başardı. Seçkin birliklerine, Kızıl Zındıklar'a katılmaya davet edildi. Bazıları Sakkubus Tazarra'nın ölümünden onun sorumlu olduğunu söylüyor. Öyleyse Marazhai, Tarikat saflarında gördüğü muameleden hoşnut olmayabilir."
languages.original_text: "That brazen, ambitious, and woefully imprudent whelp. He was cast down from the Dracons of the Kabal but earned the good graces of the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst in his very first fight in the arena. He was invited to join their finest, the Bloodstained Proselytes. Some say he was involved in the death of their Succubus, Tazarra — if so, then Marazhai may be disappointed by his reception in the ranks of the Cult."

traits.locale_text: "Yüzsüz, hırslı ve üzüntü verici derecede ihtiyatsız enik. Kabal Drakonları tarafından indirildi ama arenadaki ilk dövüşünde Ölüme Susamışlık'ın Viçlerinin gözüne girmeyi başardı. Seçkin birliklerine, Kızıl Zındıklara katılmaya davet edildi. Bazıları Sakkubusları Tazarra'nın ölümünden onun sorumlu olduğunu söylüyor. Öyleyse Marazhai, Tarikat saflarında karşı karşıya kaldığı tepkilerden hoşnut olmayabilir."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
